Message.Title: Why so many people say Cramers mojo is gone
Message.Msg: He can't pick a stock He only does well when we have rally that goes also for my little kid he can pick a stock when we have rally and make $$

Topic.Title: Why so many people say Cramers mojo is gone

Message.Msg: Cramer is a great entertainer. I rank him right up there with Milton Berle and Red Buttons. But as far as investment advice goes, forget it.

Topic.Title: Why so many people say Cramers mojo is gone

Message.Msg: investment advice is not to lose cash. but there is no growth, no inflation, no income, and no real demand for homes and no jobs jmho but in my area theres no spending, people just hanging on. and many media people involved in markets and wall street some day soon will lose jobs too. but they have huge cushions of cash to get them by., it is looking ugly out there (in northeast)

Topic.Title: Why so many people say Cramers mojo is gone

Message.Msg: An entertainer like him can do lots of damage to the market Market is not place to entertain He is turning in to biggest greedy pig on the street Just like JCP ? Why is up ? who is the big holder ? What makes JCP diffrent from there rest of retail ?
Not surprising, since Ginny took over - time to tinker with her comp plan as a shareholder initiative.

Message.Title: Bill Clinton Balanced the Budget... Obama is Bankrupting America
Message.Msg: We added $3 billion to the national debt for every day Obama spent relaxing on the beach in Hawaii. Bill Clinton NEVER would have done that. Bill Clinton worked with Newt Gingrich, Bob Dole and Trent Lott... Republicans ALL, to BALANCE the budget. THAT, is leadership. Obama hasn't agreed on ANYTHING with Republicans in congress... not ONE SINGLE THING in 4 LONG YEARS... and our country is going bankrupt and facing a 'fiscal cliff" while Obama sits on a beach in Hawaii. This is INSANITY... This president is HORRIBLE... ... what would our Grandfathers say if they saw us Re-elect a guy who had done to us what this President has done to us. S

Topic.Title: Bill Clinton Balanced the Budget... Obama is Bankrupting America

Message.Msg: What would YOUR Grandfather say if he saw you whining on a stock message board? "Some people would complain if you hung them with a new rope."
Pigs with overstuffed guts cannot move fast enough to dance in this market. You should go with the winners

Topic.Title: Bill Clinton Balanced the Budget... Obama is Bankrupting America

Message.Msg: Wake up, all spending originates in the House, blaming the President is just plain stupid.

Topic.Title: Why so many people say Cramers mojo is gone

Message.Msg: you are near retirement with some cash? forget about buying stocks. this is long term slow growth economy with traders looking to rip suckers off. bonds dicey?? the bond market crashes?? sure buy stocks and watch prices fall. traders, fast money traders wait to sucker unwary out of bonds into stocks then sell sell sell leaving idiots holding the bag. anyone hear whether warren the multi multi billionaire is buying MORE ibm? over 50, hang onto your cash or get a great long/short hedge fund...long in the market will crush you.
